name: Rocker Kid Plays Hooky demo
description:
This demo is a proof-of-concept partial version of Rocker Kid Plays Hooky, a member of an upcoming suite of games in the Bitchin' Rocker Kids universe.

Character Designs: John Cooper.
Programming, Animation (such that it is), and (lack of) Design: Andy Grossberg.
Music: Sampled from Chiptune Planet's versions of Celtic Frost songs. (This music is a placeholder and I own no rights.)

In the real game everything should be better and optimized. There will be another weapon, two more enemies, a boss, difficulty levels, and a high score system.

Plus you'll get a special prize if you win.
